mtas.codec

Class MtasFieldsConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.FieldsConsumer
      • mtas.codec.MtasFieldsConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MtasFieldsConsumer
extends org.apache.lucene.codecs.FieldsConsumer
    The Class MtasFieldsConsumer constructs several temporal and permanent files to provide a forward index
    • Temporary files
      • Temporary file mtasTmpFieldFileName with extension "mtas.field.temporary"
        Contains for each field a reference to the list of documents. Structure of content:
        • String: field
        • VLong: reference to mtasDocFileName
        • VInt: number of documents
        • VLong: reference to mtasTermFileName
        • VInt: number of terms
        • VLong: reference to mtasPrefixFileName
        • VInt: number of prefixes
      • Temporary file mtasTmpObjectFileName with extension "mtas.object.temporary"
        Contains for a specific field all objects constructed by createObjectAndRegisterPrefix. For all fields, the objects are later on copied to mtasObjectFileName while statistics are collected. Structure of content identical to mtasObjectFileName.
      • Temporary file mtasTmpDocsFileName with extension "mtas.docs.temporary"
        Contains for a specific field for each doc multiple fragments. Each occurring term results in a fragment. Structure of content:
        • VInt: docId
        • VInt: number of objects in this fragment
        • VLong: offset references to mtasTmpObjectFileName
        • VInt,VLong: mtasId object, reference temporary object in mtasTmpObjectFileName minus offset
        • VInt,VLong: ...
      • Temporary file mtasTmpDocsChainedFileName with extension "mtas.docs.chained.temporary"
        Contains for a specific field for each doc multiple chained fragments. Structure of content:
        • VInt: docId
        • VInt: number of objects in this fragment
        • VLong: offset references to mtasTmpObjectFileName
        • VInt,VLong: mtasId object, reference temporary object in mtasTmpObjectFileName minus offset
        • VInt,VLong: ...
        • VLong: reference to next fragment in mtasTmpDocsChainedFileName, self reference indicates end of chain
      • Temporary file mtasTmpDocFileName with extension "mtas.doc.temporary"
        For each document
        • VInt: docId
        • VLong: reference to mtasIndexObjectIdFileName
        • VLong: reference first object, used as offset for tree index
        • VInt: slope used in approximation reference objects index on id
        • ZLong: offset used in approximation reference objects index on id
        • Byte: flag indicating how corrections on the approximation references objects for the index on id are stored: MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_BYTE, MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_SHORT, MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_INTEGER or MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_LONG
        • VInt: number of objects in this document
        • VInt: first position
        • VInt: last position
    • Final files
      • File mtasIndexFieldFileName with extension "mtas.field"
        Contains for each field a reference to the list of documents and the prefixes. Structure of content:
        • String: field
        • VLong: reference to mtasDocFileName
        • VLong: reference to mtasIndexDocIdFileName
        • VInt: number of documents
        • VLong: reference to mtasTermFileName
        • VInt: number of terms
        • VLong: reference to mtasPrefixFileName
        • VInt: number of prefixes
      • File mtasTermFileName with extension "mtas.term"
        For each field, all unique terms are stored here. Structure of content:
        • String: term
      • File mtasPrefixFileName with extension "mtas.prefix"
        For each field, all unique prefixes are stored here. Structure of content:
        • String: prefix
      • File mtasObjectFileName with extension "mtas.object"
        Contains all objects for all fields. Structure of content:
        • VInt: mtasId
        • VInt: objectFlags
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_PARENT
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_RANGE
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_SET
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_OFFSET
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_REALOFFSET
          • MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_PAYLOAD
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_PARENT
          VInt: parentId
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_RANGE
          VInt,VInt: startPosition and (endPosition-startPosition)
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_SET
          VInt,VInt,VInt,...: number of positions, firstPosition, (position-previousPosition),...
        • Only if no MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_RANGE or MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_POSITION_SET
          VInt: position
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_OFFSET
          VInt,VInt: startOffset, (endOffset-startOffset)
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_REALOFFSET
          VInt,VInt: startRealOffset, (endRealOffset-startRealOffset)
        • Only if MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_OBJECT_HAS_PAYLOAD
          VInt,Bytes: number of bytes, payload
        • VLong: reference to Term in mtasTermFileName
      • File mtasIndexDocIdFileName with extension "mtas.index.doc.id"
        Contains for each field a tree structure MtasTree to search reference to mtasDocFileName by id. Structure of content for each node:
        • VLong: offset references to mtasIndexDocIdFileName, only available in root node
        • Byte: flag, should be zero for this tree, only available in root node
        • VInt: left
        • VInt: right
        • VInt: max
        • VLong: left reference to mtasIndexDocIdFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VLong: right reference to mtasIndexDocIdFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VInt: number of objects on this node (always 1 for this tree)
        • VLong: reference to mtasDocFileName minus offset
      • File mtasDocFileName with extension "mtas.doc"
        For each document
        • VInt: docId
        • VLong: reference to mtasIndexObjectIdFileName
        • VLong: reference to mtasIndexObjectPositionFileName
        • VLong: reference to mtasIndexObjectParentFileName
        • VLong: reference first object, used as offset for tree index
        • VInt: slope used in approximation reference objects index on id
        • ZLong: offset used in approximation reference objects index on id
        • Byte: flag indicating how corrections on the approximation references objects for the index on id are stored: MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_BYTE, MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_SHORT, MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_INTEGER or MtasCodecPostingsFormat.MTAS_STORAGE_LONG
        • VInt: number of objects
        • VInt: first position
        • VInt: last position
      • File mtasIndexObjectIdFileName with extension "mtas.index.object.id"
        Provides for each mtasId the reference to mtasObjectFileName. These references are grouped by document, sorted by mtasId, and because the mtasId's for each document will always start with 0 and are sequential without gaps, a reference can be computed if the position of the first reference for a document is known from mtasDocFileName. The reference is approximated by the reference to the first object plus the mtasId times a slope. Only a correction to this approximation is stored. Structure of content:
        • Byte/Short/Int/Long: correction reference to mtasObjectFileName
      • File mtasIndexObjectPositionFileName with extension "mtas.index.object.position"
        Contains for each document a tree structure MtasTree to search objects by position. Structure of content for each node:
        • VLong: offset references to mtasIndexObjectPositionFileName, only available in root node
        • Byte: flag, should be zero for this tree, only available in root node
        • VInt: left
        • VInt: right
        • VInt: max
        • VLong: left reference to mtasIndexObjectPositionFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VLong: right reference to mtasIndexObjectPositionFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VInt: number of objects on this node
        • VLong,VInt,VLong: set of the first reference to mtasObjectFileName minus offset, the prefixId referring to the position the prefix in mtasPrefixFileName and the reference to mtasTermFileName minus offset
        • VLong,VInt,VLong,...: for optional other sets of reference to mtasObjectFileName, position of the prefix in mtasPrefixFileName and the reference to mtasTermFileName; for the first item the difference between this reference minus the previous reference is stored
      • File mtasIndexObjectParentFileName with extension "mtas.index.object.parent"
        Contains for each document a tree structure MtasTree to search objects by parent. Structure of content for each node:
        • VLong: offset references to mtasIndexObjectParentFileName , only available in root node
        • Byte: flag, for this tree equal to MtasTree.SINGLE_POSITION_TREE indicating a tree with exactly one point at each node, only available in root node
        • VInt: left
        • VInt: right
        • VInt: max
        • VLong: left reference to mtasIndexObjectParentFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VLong: right reference to mtasIndexObjectParentFileName minus the offset stored in the root node
        • VInt: number of objects on this node
        • VLong,VInt,VLong: set of the first reference to mtasObjectFileName minus offset, the prefixId referring to the position the prefix in mtasPrefixFileName and the reference to mtasTermFileName minus offset
        • VLong,VInt,VLong,...: for optional other sets of reference to mtasObjectFileName, position of the prefix in mtasPrefixFileName and the reference to mtasTermFileName; for the first item the difference between this reference minus the previous reference is stored
